snippet: Ivory Coast transferred Charles Ble Goude, a youth leader and close ally of ex-president Laurent Gbagbo, to the International Criminal Court (ICC) on Saturday to face charges of crimes against humanity linked to a 2011 post-election civil war....

headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast Sends Gbagbo Ally to International Criminal Court
headline.main: Ivory Coast Sends Gbagbo Ally to International Criminal Court

lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast transferred Charles Ble Goude, a youth leader and close ally of ex-president Laurent Gbagbo, to the International Criminal Court (ICC) on Saturday to face charges of crimes against humanity linked to a 2011 post-election civil war.
